Wrapper R Functions

smog(<default>) smog(<formula>)

Generalized linear model constraint on hierarchical structure by using overlapped group penalty

predict method for objects of the class smog

plot method for objects of smog class

cross-validation for conditional group lasso method

Internal C++ Functions

glog()

Generalized linear model constraint on hierarchical structure by using overlapped group penalty

penalty()

Penalty function on the composite L2, L2-Square, and L1 penalties

prox()

Composite proximal operator based on L2, L2-Square, and L1 penalties

proxL1()

L1 proximal operator

proxL2()

L2 proximal operator

Simulation Functions

sim_rct_biomarker()

Simulate a randomized clinical trial with biomarkers
